name: magpie-modules
description: minimal architecture for the generation of portable interactive experiments (https://github.com/magpie-ea/magpie-modules)

scripts.concat: concat -o magpie.js src/* && concat -o magpie.full.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/csv-js/csv.js node_modules/lodash/lodash.min.js magpie.js
